it.uniroma3.dia.gc

Interface Graph

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ASCIIGraph, ASCIIOfflineGraph, BVGraphWrapper, CompressedGraph

    public interface Graph
    This interface permits to define a directed graph represented as adjacency lists.
    Version:
    0.1.1
    Author:
    Guido Drovandi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getEdgeCount()
      Returns the number of edges in this graph.
      int[] getInDegrees()
      Returns an int array view of indegrees in this graph.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the graph.
      int[] getNeighbourhood(int node)
      Returns an int array view of the successors and predecessors of node in this graph.
      int[] getOutDegrees()
      Returns an int array view of outdegrees in this graph.
      int[] getPredecessors(int node)
      Returns an int array view of the predecessors of node in this graph.
      int[] getSuccessors(int node)
      Returns an int array view of the successors of node in this graph.
      int getVertexCount()
      Returns the number of vertices in this graph.
      int inDegree(int node)
      Returns the number of predecessors (ingoing edges) of node.
      boolean isNeighbor(int a, int b)
      Check if the edge (a,b) exists.
      int outDegree(int node)
      Returns the number of successors (outgoing edges) of node.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the graph.
        Returns:
        the name of the graph

      • getVertexCount

        int getVertexCount()
        Returns the number of vertices in this graph.
        Returns:
        the number of vertices

      • getEdgeCount

        long getEdgeCount()
        Returns the number of edges in this graph.
        Returns:
        the number of edges

      • getPredecessors

        int[] getPredecessors(int node)
        Returns an int array view of the predecessors of node in this graph. A vertex v is a predecessor of node if the edge (v,node) exists.
        Parameters:
        node - the vertex whose predecessors are to be returned
        Returns:
        an int array view of the predecessors of node in this graph

      • getSuccessors

        int[] getSuccessors(int node)
        Returns an int array view of the successors of node in this graph. A vertex v is a successor of node if the edge (node,v) exists.
        Parameters:
        node - the vertex whose successors are to be returned
        Returns:
        an int array view of the successors of node in this graph

      • getNeighbourhood

        int[] getNeighbourhood(int node)
        Returns an int array view of the successors and predecessors of node in this graph. A neighbour that is bith successor and predecessor appears only once.
        Parameters:
        node - the vertex whose successors and predecessors are to be returned
        Returns:
        an int array view of the successors and predecessors of node in this graph

      • outDegree

        int outDegree(int node)
        Returns the number of successors (outgoing edges) of node.
        Parameters:
        node - the vertex whose outdegree is to be returned
        Returns:
        the number of successors of node

      • inDegree

        int inDegree(int node)
        Returns the number of predecessors (ingoing edges) of node.
        Parameters:
        node - the vertex whose indegree is to be returned
        Returns:
        the number of predecessors of node

      • getOutDegrees

        int[] getOutDegrees()
        Returns an int array view of outdegrees in this graph.
        Returns:
        an int array view of outdegrees

      • getInDegrees

        int[] getInDegrees()
        Returns an int array view of indegrees in this graph.
        Returns:
        an int array view of indegrees

      • isNeighbor

        boolean isNeighbor(int a,
                   int b)
        Check if the edge (a,b) exists.
        Parameters:
        a - the source of the edge
        b - the destination of the edge
        Returns:
        returns true if (a,b) is an edge
